post.body: Hells yeah! that deserves another half flask huh. BTW - just gave out vanilla using your & elises recipe. HUGE hit. thanks!
gotta run for something. I run for beer and burgers myself!
Just did. Looks like we need someone to run a hundred miler this week or something :-)
HAHA well.. too young for beer , so what else could be missing from that dinner?
I dunno, but chewing / closing my teeth together in the morning really hurts. I'll have to check
Iuse that as a general 'where am i at' test. I usualy run at 60-80% of that number and if i get too close to it I back off.
@maddyhubba thanks for the heads up.. i'll get one asap. headache in the mornings are getting way too common. thx
WHOAH, you doing the FA50K in 2 weeks??
I have been there last 3 years now. but it is a great race. finish awesome. dont then I have umstead 7 wks later so good training
yeah.. screw shoes... barefoot is better anywhoo. ohh.. you meant you put screws in your shoes. that makes more sense.
and its 10x better than chicago with its 40K. all about the runner, not the sponsors.
i would not save it for NYC at all. smaller races have more charcter (IMHO). my fave mthn usually has 100ish ppl in it.
you'll do great.. you have plenty of time. enjoy the 1st, none will ever be as special as a 1st marathon.
that verges on sick.. mad, crazy, stupid sick. I'm jealous
just call it pre run painkillers :) I'll have to try myers nexttime. how long are ya goin?
watching Man vs Wild . had the best cheeseburger. man, it was one heckuva great 3 day weekend.
15 miles done:) rough start and slow finish, but done all the same. Now time 4 my reward. Double cheese and fries!!
just woke up and about to head out for a run. 13-15 depending on how I feel once the feet hit the pavement.
nytol
sweet! finished up lego indiana jones. stayed up WAY later than Iwanted, but with the temps being nice Ican go 4 a run later and be ok
BTW - if anyone has a zune.. my ID on zune.net is SouthernComfort. add me as a friend if ya want (mkay, puhleaze add me :)
watching season 1 of Knight Rider. WOW theres more cheese in this than in all of Wisconsin.
Several uneventful hours unpacking. Do you ever get done unboxing??
cleaning house, putting up stuff from the move. surely theres an emergency somewhere that'll get me outta this!!!
Kick butt awesome 7 mile run. Really , finally, feel back in the shape I like.
my favorite part of winter is... its about noon and I can still go for a run and it be comfy. summer you have 2 get up at 4am 2 beat da heat
woke up with a mind splitting headache. think i'm clinching my teeth when i sleep. how do u stop what u cannt control
played xbox360 with wifey for like 7+ hours. had a blast. game night is always fun.
Shows about to start. Still feels amazing to only have 1 house payment. Just a awesome feeling.
Going to usher at a local play. Shoot me now (plaease!!!)
Hawt dahm the house is rented. There's a grand a month back in my income stream. What a relief.
printing out lease and about to head over to old house to get it rented (fnally!!!)
due to lack of slee all week, Idecided to postpone LR till tomorrow. slept what seemed like forever but really just like 11 hours.
just got the OKto run Rocky in February. Ineed to evaluate vac time but it would be a great training run and hopefully ws100 qualifier
well.... Igave up on setting it up using my mac. using my work computer now and it is OFFICIALLY work now. bou bedtime. 20 miler in the am
effin computer. cant setup print server on pc side of a mac using fusion. dis sux
setting up wireless print server on 2 printers and a scanner.
ok... ok.. I'm heading back to work... I mean going to add extra router to my home network. nope.. still sounds like work.
maybe its cause I work in ITall day, but Iswear Iloathe fixing my own home computers. just seems too much like work.
having an awesome kaluah egg nog. yumm-diddly-ishious
